evidence.text: Person A: We've quite a full house this evening so I took the liberty of making up a place for you in the guest house. We can have your things sent for in the morning.

Person A: The Chapel's interior is more generous in its expression; the vernacular concrete contrasted by an altarpiece of marble from the mountains of Carrara will serve as the institute's centerpiece.
Person B: Oh, how wonderful! The town is sure to be over the moon when they see you've kept faith and values at the forefront of your design.

Person A: Sugar?
Person B: Black.

Person B: I see Zsofia.
Person B: Zsofia!
